mapper.sql: user_id as userId, username as username, password as password, email as email, mobile as mobile, status as status, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, dept_id as deptId, parent_id as parentId, all_parent_id as allParentId, device_count as deviceCount, project_count as projectCount, head_url as headUrl, update_user as updateUser, term_of_validity as termOfValidity, flag as flag, is_bind_mtype as isBindMtype, salt as salt, real_name as realName, deadline as deadline
mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select salt from sys_user where flag=1
and username = #{username}
